LanguageData.AncientCommsConsole.label: ancient comms console
LanguageData.AncientCommsConsole.description: An ancient console with an attached communications dish. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepPod.label: ancient cryptosleep pod
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepPod.description: A single-use pod for preserving one person in a state of suspended animation. Unlike cryptosleep caskets, cryptosleep pods can only be used once.
LanguageData.AncientEnemyTerminal.label: ancient enemy terminal
LanguageData.AncientEnemyTerminal.description: An ancient computer terminal. It can be hacked to call nearby enemies.
LanguageData.AncientFuelNode.label: ancient unstable fuel node
LanguageData.AncientFuelNode.description: An ancient, unstable fuel node once used to charge machines with fuel. It has become unstable over the years due to lack of maintenance.
LanguageData.AncientHermeticCrate.label: hermetic crate
LanguageData.AncientHermeticCrate.description: A self-powered hermetically-sealed crate for preserving valuable items. These can preserve their contents for a long time.
LanguageData.AncientSecurityCrate.label: security crate
LanguageData.AncientSecurityCrate.description: A large self-powered hermetically-sealed crate with built-in security alarms. These can preserve their contents for a long time. If it is opened without the proper code, it will probably activate some nearby security system.
LanguageData.AncientTerminal.label: ancient terminal
LanguageData.AncientTerminal.description: An ancient computer terminal. It can be hacked to reveal long-forgotten information.
